item.title: Speaker Johnson says no quick fix to Obamacare subsidy 'boondoggle'

item.title: IRS has a bizarre habit of hanging up on callers

item.title: The Medal Of Freedom Was Created For People Exactly Like Charlie Kirk

item.title: Punishing Propagandists Like Stephanopoulos For Playing Dirty Starts With Starving Them Of GOP Guests
item.description: If Stephanopoulos has made one thing clear over his last two decades in media, it’s that he will not relent until Republicans make him.

item.title: A Hard-Fought Triumph in Israel
item.description: Today’s return of hostages is the direct result of Jerusalem’s commitment and Trump’s unwavering support in the face of immense pressure.

item.title: Trump says Phase Two of the Gaza peace plan has already begun

item.title: If Anyone’s Causing A ‘Judicial Crisis,’ It’s Rogue Lower Court Judges
item.description: The real crisis is rogue lower court judges who have no respect for separation of powers or the constitutional role of the judicial branch.

item.title: Trump inks Gaza peace accord in Egypt as hostages freed, prisoners released: 'It's going to hold up'
item.description: President Trump on Monday signed an agreement to end the more than two-year war in Gaza.

item.title: Restoring Columbus to His Rightful Place
item.description: The White House correctly celebrates the courage, entrepreneurial ambition, religious zeal, and daring that impelled figures like Columbus.

item.title: Kamala Harris’s Grand Delusions
item.description: The twice-failed presidential candidate’s book tour is an excruciating reminder of why she lost.

item.title: Welker Suggests Trump Weaponized DOJ To Go After Comey, Letitia James: All The Questions From Meet The Press
item.description: Welker suggested that Trump was overstepping a line that Biden already crossed multiple times by going after political opponents.
